Reviews.Title: “Bad experience”
Reviews.Author: ArchieArcher Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: bad experience hotel starting moment card reader 2 reserved broken trying 20 times reception explaining guy card reader desk sent finally managed multiple day didnt lucky noticed cleaning team thanks ladies otherwise girl reception looking busy upset lots noise coming bar street nice hotel wont reason time offer 2 nights weekend

Reviews.Title: “Not the same good experience that I had with other Accor hotels.”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: berlin looking budget hotel checked hotel location town center explains low prices hotel saved unpleasant surprise customary teacoffee offered free probably accor hotels location bit noisy theres pool bang opposite hotel standard complains cheers

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: CrazyCroat
Reviews.Content: standard 3 star hotellocation near metro 20 minutes airport direct bus stops meters hotel clean nice bathroom scared ghosts street yes cemetery hotel wouldnt recommend meal hotel becuse meters hotel restaurant unbelievable prices called la check prices web site food bad free wifi internet pay

HotelInfo.Name: Ibis Berlin Neukoelln
HotelInfo.Address: Jahnstrasse 13, 12347 Berlin, Germany (Formerly Hotel Britzer Hof)
